channel.title: Miasmic spell
channel.description:
Hey Guys
How do i add the miasmic spells and get them to work i am using 317-474
Thx :D

item.title: Miasmic spell
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

be more descriptive, its honestly not worth the time, i tried once out of boredom, and you are better off just making a 525 then.


and yes i know it was fail, and i know now that that was the wrong model.

if you are hell bent on adding it, you will need to, hardcode a new magic interface,
and either:

  1. rip new model loading from a 474+ client
    or
  2. convert the model into meta and reanimate it.

Regardless of what you choose goodluck.

Read full topic
